name: Three Swipes
description:
Combine three cute animals in this charming take on a match puzzle. Swipe three or more sea creatures together to make a match. Score higher than your friends on a variety of relaxing yet challenging levels. Use your bombs and special moves to blast icebergs and other tricky obstacles.

More levels coming soon!

Three Swipes features:
• Free to play
• Swipe to move all the cute animal tiles on the board
• Match three or more tiles of the same color to remove them
• Progress through levels
• Enjoy the charming design and cute colors
• Relax, there is no time limit
• Charming beach puzzle theme
• Sync your progress across devices
• Compete with your friends on per-level leaderboards

What players are saying:
• "Easy, captivating, soothing colors and fun."
• "I like the idea of a 2048 type game but with colors!"
• "I really like it! I love the simplicity, without the crazy graphics and sounds of the candy crush like games."
• "I like that it shuffles the puzzle instead of making you restart the level."

Gameplay tips:
• Match four or more tiles to clear all the tiles of that color
• Match two sets of tiles to make a bomb
• Use bombs to clear icebergs

We hope you'll love our match puzzle game! Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support@robotogames.com
